channel.title: Changing map data on 317 client
channel.description:
hello i have a question that me and my friend have been trying to find out. how can we change the map data in a 317 client?
i have tryed to use map changers like T X's but then i found out that they were for rsc servers so ive been on google for about a month now looking for a way to change the map data on the 317 client i have? anyone know how plz post i need your help. btw i am not changing the map in the server its in the client
if this brakes any rules i am srry i read them and i think this is to your spec.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2008, 06:10:35 am[/size][hr]does anyone know? plz tell i need to know how to change it
